New Records: Kerry Carpenter matched a career high with four hits
Key Match Events: Riley Greene and Trey Sweeney homered for Detroit
The Tigers got off to another flying start with six runs in the first
Colorado rallied with three runs in the fifth
Ezequiel Tovar hit a two-run double to right-center
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers are three games behind Minnesota for the last American League wild card
Post-Match Reflections: The 2023 Tigers finished second in the AL Central — they are currently fourth — but their 78-84 record left them out of the wild-card race
The Tigers improved to 20-8 since Aug. 11
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tanner Gordon (0-6) took the loss, allowing seven runs and 10 hits in 3 1/3 innings
In his last two starts, the rookie has given up 12 runs on 18 hits in four innings
